name: Barrow Hill: Curse of the Ancient Circle
description:
Barrow Hill is a gripping horror thriller for the home computer, set in the Cornish landscape of England and told from a first person perspective.

Shadow Tor Studios, the developers of Barrow Hill, transform the local dark legends and ancient monuments, into a immersive gaming experience. From eerie woodlands to desolate farm buildings, the game world of Barrow Hill is very much alive, and keeps the players looking over their shoulder.

Set in the leafy depths of ancient Cornwall, the thriller sees players uncovering an archaeological nightmare, and piece together a mystery dating back centuries. The clues are spread across the beautiful, and eerie, Cornish landscape, and it will take skill and ingenuity to find them.
